jobDescription: Job Posting Title Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Data Analyst – Project Hire  18-May-2018 Job Description It’s the magic of immersing yourself in a motion picture masterpiece, or a new track from your favorite band, or the spectacle of a live Broadway show. It’s hard to define and even harder to create, but that’s what we do at The Walt Disney Studios. Ours is a culture of innovation, collaboration and creativity. We raise the bar, then step over it, blazing trails through the production and distribution of world class entertainment around the globe. If you want to help tell compelling, enduring stories through movies, music or stage plays, then we want to hear from you.  Are you curious, creative, and love data? Do you love to learn new things and collaborate with stunning colleagues to solve hard and interesting problems? Do you want to be on the cutting edge of breakthroughs in data and analytics, encouraged to discover, challenged to think bigger, and supported to learn new things personally and professionally? Do you love the challenge and excitement that comes with not knowing today, what problem you might be working on tomorrow? Do you thrive in a high paced environment? Do you want to “make a difference” with the work you do?  The Walt Disney Studios seeks a Business/Data/Social Analyst to join the Studio Consumer Insights & Analytics team. This team is a highly visible department that plays an integral part in key business decisions across the Studio organization and the company. The goal of the Analytic Insights team is to create a competitive advantage for TWDS by leveraging data and advanced analytics. This position requires passion, curiosity, analytical, and story-telling skills. This position also requires the ability to work closely with business segments to gain perspective and a strong understanding of objectives. A curious, proactive, independent, high-energy, positive attitude is a must. The Business/Data/Social Analyst is responsible for segmentation and personalization of the contact strategies for Disney Movie Rewards and Disney/Lucas/Marvel/Pixar home entertainment CRM efforts. As an integrated member of the team, the CRM Data Analyst leverages the Studio consumer database to provide comprehensive analysis and reporting on campaign performance across promotions & email campaigns.  This is a 12 month project hire role.
